name: MoorlMerchantFinder

infos.name: Händlersuche (OpenStreetMap) | Basis Version
infos.description:
⚠️⚠️⚠️Wichtiger Hinweis ab Version 2.4⚠️⚠️⚠️

Alle Interaktionen mit der Karte werden ab sofort in den Plugin Einstellungen von moori Foundation vorgenommen!

Dieses Plugin benötigt moori Foundation

https://store.shopware.com/moorl50852475974f/foundation-basis-version.html

Optional empfehle ich auch das Feature Add-On, da die Demo Daten von diesem Plugin damit zusammen gestellt wurden

https://store.shopware.com/moorl87443379024/features-add-on-foundation.html
infos.shortDescription: Zeige Sie Ihren Besuchern Händler und Filialen für Ihre Produkte an. Die Adressen sind auf einer Karte sichtbar. Dieses Plugin ist auch für weitere Standorte geeignet.
infos.highlights: Kein Google - OpenStreetMap ist Open Source und kann ohne API-Schlüssel etc. genutzt werden, du kannst also sofort loslegen Handling von großen Datenmengen - Du kannst mehrere tausende Standorte eintragen. Die Pagination und der Filter sorgen für strukturierte Daten und anhaltende Performance Maximale Integrität - Listings, Slider und Globale Suche sind bereits inbegriffen SEO Optimiert - SEO URLs, Pflege von Metadaten möglich, strukturierte Daten für Standorte, Adressen und Personen Vollständig individualisierbar - Übersicht und Detailseiten basieren vollständig auf das CMS System von Shopware, jedes Element ist ein CMS Element und kann jederzeit durch eigene Themes angepasst werden
infos.features: Umkreissuche - Suche nach Postleitzahl, Ort und Straße möglich, automatische Ausgabe der Entfernung Filter - Filterung nach Ländern, Herstellern, Tags und Kategorien möglich - auch mehrfach! Eigene Map-Icons - Die Icons kann man selbständig anpassen, es lassen sich auch Standard-Icons für alle Händler zuweisen Import/Export Assistent - Ermöglicht es CSV Tabellen zu importieren oder zu exportieren Kompatibel mit Formular Baukasten 2 - Erstelle eigene Formulare und lass deine Kunden direkt mit dem Händler kommunizieren!

infos.name: Store-Locator (OpenStreetMap) | Base Version
infos.description:
Plugin documentation (German): https://docs.moori.net/MoorlMerchantFinder/

Setup guide (German): https://docs.moori.net/MoorlMerchantFinder/setup/


Note: This plugin requires the current version of the Moorleiche Foundation Plugin.

You can find this plugin here: https://store.shopware.com/moorl50852475974f/moorleiche-foundation-plugin.html

This plugin contains the basic functions for a dealer search. You can include any CSV export and complete it with the help of the import wizard. Through the OpenStreetMap API you can calculate the positions for the map during import. This API does not require a key, such as Google Maps.

Attention: The storefront-controller has been removed in version 1.1.0, the setup is now only possible via the adventure worlds.

Planned updates for the next 6 months (sorted by priority):

  1. Create Twig blocks in the templates
  2. Import / Export including tags, manufacturers and categories
  3. Integration of own map tiles - see: https://leaflet-extras.github.io/leaflet-providers/preview/
  4. Popup with contact form to contact the dealer directly via e-mail
  5. Creating and linking CMS pages for traders
  6. Better usability for the full-screen dealer search
  7. Two further designs and colour schemes

I like to be inspired by suggestions and proposals, a short mail to me is enough: info@moorleiche.com
infos.shortDescription: Show your visitors dealers and branches for your products. The addresses are visible on a map. This plugin is also suitable for other Points of Interest.
infos.highlights:
OpenStreetMap on the shop page
import wizard
Circumference search using the postcode or the city
Different styles and full screen dealer search
Extra filter options: Tags, categories and manufacturers
infos.features:
Elements for the shopping worlds
Manufacturer logos visible for every dealer in the frontend
Smoothe zoom effects and automatic scrolling to the selected dealer
Standard Design adapts to the shop design
Circumference search with indication of distance
Simplified setup thanks to demo data

priceModels.bookingText: Dealer and branch search with OpenStreetMap
Dealer and branch search with OpenStreetMap

comments.text: Ein - in Anbetracht des Umfanges - vollauf "Preis-wertes" Plugin, das Shopware sinnvoll erweitert. Gute Installations- und Bedienungsdokumentation. Prima Support!
comments.headline: Tolles Plugin!
Super schneller Support. Plugin macht das was es soll. Solide Funktionalität
Sehr gutes Plugin um seine Standorte anschaulich darzustellen. Schneller und persönlicher Support.

label: Händlersuche (OpenStreetMap) | Basis Version

⚠️⚠️⚠️Wichtiger Hinweis ab Version 2.4⚠️⚠️⚠️

Alle Interaktionen mit der Karte werden ab sofort in den Plugin Einstellungen von moori Foundation vorgenommen!

Dieses Plugin benötigt moori Foundation

https://store.shopware.com/moorl50852475974f/foundation-basis-version.html

changelog.text:
• Inheritance of templates adapted
  • ElasticSearch does not have to be installed anymore

• Opening hours can be deactivated individually
  • Link to CMS page can be optionally hidden
• Optional CMS listing filter by type to separate entries from each other

• Added TWIG template for the popup content of the map
  • Address can be hidden in the popup
• Restoring a field removed by an update

• Deleting old SEO Urls during deactivation/activation
  • An already edited SEO Url is no longer overwritten
• Hotfix which fixes a serious bug in the storefront

• Note: Update moori Foundation first
  • After the update the plugin-list can disappear. No panic, just clear the shop cache. You can use ALT+C to clear it.
  • Removed unused files

• Filter optionally selectable (product): Filter by merchant
  • Filter optional selectable (merchant): Area search, text search, filter by country, manufacturer and tags
  • Compatible with Elasticsearch (product listing)

• Postcode search for dealer search improved
  • Please deactivate and reactivate the plugin

• Final adjustments
  • Previous functions marked as "deprecated"
  • Please deactivate and reactivate plugin
  • Map markers can be reinstalled via the demo wizard

• New dynamic listing with map for large amounts of data
  • Example CMS pages can be installed by deactivating the plugin once and activating it again.

• CMS Listing / Slider element added
  • More updates to follow....

New version of the plugin

  • Handler selection is currently NOT compatible
  • The plugin must be deactivated once and reactivated again
  • Map markers must be reassigned
  • Popup window deactivated
  • CMS detail page for traders incl. structured data, map, address, contact
  • Google Place ID added
  • Keywords, Meta Title and Meta Description added
  • Global search for dealers
  • Automatic translations added
  • Further updates will follow soon....
• Extension of the decimal places for altitudes and latitudes

• Admin search for stores recovered
  • Wording adjusted
  • Opening hours can be deactivated per store

• Icons replaced with SVG
  • Compatible for v6.4.11
  • Old CMS element/block deactivated

• Adaptation of the inheritance/template order
  • Bug fix for translation/sorting of manufacturer names
• Fixes a shopping cart error in the "Stocks and delivery times" add-on

• Filters without search results in the sales channel are hidden (e.g. countries). However, the total results of the respective filters are no longer displayed. 
  • The translations of the countries are no longer mandatory.
  • Indexer for SEO Urls fixed
  • Store Urls can be maintained again
  • Automatic assignment of the country based on the ISO code

• Bugfix in tag assignment
  • Allocation of multiple sales channels possible

• Demo data incl. images
  • Demo data will now be installed via the wizard

• Fixed map zoom when scrolling
  • Fixed console bug in admin
BUGFIX: Wrong number of search results for manufacturer filter

• Bug fixing when MySQL/MariaDB cache is active
  • Performance optimisation of the proximity search
  • Note: As of version 1.5.1, template changes must be made for custom themes.

• Marker Icon Manager
  • Improved usability
  • Final adjustments for merchant inventory plugin

• Static free text fields
  • Types: In the CMS element for category pages, there is a type filter, which can be used, for example, to display only traders who correspond to the type.
Changes for the labels of the opening hours

Note: Structural changes were made to the plugin. If there are problems with the update, please send me a mail to info@moorleiche.com.


New functions:

More powerful distance calculation for large data volumes

Enlarge the popup for details

Multilingualism available

Dealer site via CMS site including SEO Urls

Position calculation from several locations possible without import

Incorrect addresses are reset during the calculation

Adjustments regarding Google Lighthouse

Logos no longer cause bruised images

HTML description optional if no CMS page is provided

• Search can be completely hidden
  • Dynamic opening hours
  • Opening hours for all dealers
  • Opening hours for certain dealers
  • Opening hours from-to period
  • Opening hours for specific date incl. annual repetition
  • Any number of timebreaks spread over the day
  • Own designation for "closed", e.g. "day off" or "company holiday"

Code optimized

Event: MerchantsLoadedEvent with Context and MerchantCollection

Polyfill für IE Support

Anpassungen für Shopware Version 6.3
Infotext for the search results in the storefront

Popup für CMS pages

BUGFIF if no shadow icon saved

Create GET variables and use them for filters

Set Custom Marker Sales Channel specifically

Change to the postcode search

BUGFIX: Error when determining the coordinates fixed

CMS Page Support

Highlight Support

Preselection of the filters

Adaptation of new plugin guidelines

Adaptation for Shopware 6.2
Optimized import/export within tags, manufacturers and categories

Added missing snippets

BUGFIX: Image upload in backend

External tile provider integration

Defined Twig blocks

Storefront Controller Removed

Visual improvement in the shopping worlds

Revision of the style sheet

Revision Core JS - Element selectors without IDs

Revision database schema - new relation tables

New optional filter possibilities

More data output in the frontend for better individualization

Connection Moorleiche Foundation Plugin

Plugin price adjusted

Those who read reviews might find a 25% voucher
